TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local player = TriggerPlayer() local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:NotTargetted() filter:SetController( player ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY, player ) player:ChooseTarget( NO_VALIDATION, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CREATURE_TO_SACRIFICE", EffectDC():Make_Targets(0) )
local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then local player = target:GetPlayer() target:Sacrifice(player) else Object():Sacrifice(EffectController()) end
